name: Battlesnake
description:
Battlesnake is a 2 player snake game, developed for my homebrew console/computer, KAPE 8bit. The game is packaged in a self-contained custom KAPE8bit emulator executable.

"ANY KEY" in this context means W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys.

Incidentally,  WASD controls one snake, Arrow keys the other.

F4/F11 for fullscreen

Base game works, but there are some minor non-breaking bugs, as well as plans for doing more than just giving a bigger increase from a golden apple.
